creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
Section 12.3, page 12-150, Contraints, sub-bullet 2:

 - 1 or more <x:when> actions
   Must all appear before <x:otherwise>

creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text: This holds true for <c:choose> as well.

creator: bayern@essentially.net
text:
Indeed, it applies the same to both.  Fixed by adding another Stack to the
TLV.
